GeneDef.label: extreme skeptic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively doubt that there is a such thing as an "interdimensional horror" or that these "entities" are anything more than a weird animal. This instinctive belief is so entrenched in their mind that they refuse to even entertain the idea of studying them.\n\nWARNING: Because of how the dark study code is set up, I can't actually disable it specifically. Make sure to disable it in the work settings because this will permanently set the pawn's study rate and efficiency to 0.1%.

GeneDef.label: skeptic
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively doubt that there is a such thing as an "interdimensional horror" or that these "entities" are anything more than a weird animal. This instinctive belief makes it harder for them study such beings as a part of their mind is distracted searching for a more natural explanation.

GeneDef.label: decent inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to understand beings from the void, making them slightly better at studying anomalies.

GeneDef.label: inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to understand beings from the void, making them better at studying anomalies.

GeneDef.label: good inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to understand beings from the void, making them a lot better at studying anomalies.

GeneDef.label: exceptional inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to understand beings from the void, making them exceptionally good at studying anomalies.

GeneDef.label: super inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to understand beings from the void, making them super good at studying anomalies.

GeneDef.label: amazing inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are so good at figuring out what makes beings from the void tick that it could some wonder if the carrier is also from the void.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain that make it easier to analyze beings from the void.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain that make it easier to analyze beings from the void.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced inquisitor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain that make it easier to analyze beings from the void.
